message: This is a generous offer, Bob. Take it before inflation eats away at your share!
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm feeling the inflation pinch already.
The tables have turned, Bob. Inflation is working against you. I suggest you take this offer.
Alice, let's end this.  This offer is still good for you, and I need to stop this inflation rollercoaster.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before you lose even more to inflation!
